name: A Druid's Garden
description:
You are a Druid. 

Defend your Mana Leaf to gain mana each day.

Carrots, Cactus, and Flowers distract pests.

Keep your mana-crops alive for seven days to win.

Thanks to my Uncle Mark Bentley for helping me to design and program this game.

Thank you to the Game Jobs Live team for putting on GJL Game Parade 2020 (Game Jam), and for handling the license deal to use high quality music therein.

Benn Jones - Becoming of Time
provided by Universal Productions Music
